name: RoboShieldMega
body:
![roboShieldMega rev 0.2](http://dermitza.github.com/roboShieldMega/imgs/roboShieldMega0.2.PNG)

## The roboShieldMega Arduino Mega Robot shield

An Arduino Mega roboShield, back from 2010.

### Features:

The shield breaks out the Arduino Mega pins to the following modules:

* Six DC motors (controlled by XX)
* Eight analog sensors
* Four bumpers (push-buttons)
* Four ultrasonic sensors (model XX)
* Bluetooth module (for module XX)
* Colour sensor (model XX)
* IR beacon (Model XX)

In addition, it features a separate motor power supply that can be tied to the logic supply via a jumper and a reset button.

## Revisions

### rev 0.2

Rev 0.2 is the first published revision.

## Files

* Altium project files (including required libraries for the headers)
* Gerber and NC Drill files
* Schematic [PDF](https://github.com/dermitza/bigMama/blob/master/altium/bigMama.pdf)
* Pinout [PDF](https://github.com/dermitza/roboShieldMega/blob/master/altium/roboShieldMegaPinout.pdf)
